calculation_definitions.announcement_5day_return: Cumulative return from close[t-5] to close[t+0] on announcement day
calculation_definitions.release_5day_return: Cumulative return from close[t-5] to close[t+0] on release day
calculation_definitions.pre_announce_return: Average daily return 60 trading days before announcement
calculation_definitions.announce_to_release_return: Average daily return from announcement to release day
calculation_definitions.post_release_return: Average daily return 30 trading days after release
